list.abs: the Arab world must do more , pressing Hamas to disavow violence , publicly pledge not to resume the firing of rockets at Israeli civilians and revoke its anti-Semitic charter .阿拉伯世界必须做更多的事情，敦促哈马斯放弃暴力，迫使其公开承诺不再使用火箭弹袭击以色列平民，并撤销它的反犹太人宣言。
i disavow all responsibility for you ., 我不承认对你有任何责任.
on bankrupt soes and the personality disavowing principle of corporate actors ., 论国有破产企业与法人人格否认原则.
They publicly disavowed any connection with terrorist groups ., 他们公然否认与恐怖集团有任何联系.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
